test-case-oidc-core-0.name: 0 - Test Case OIDC Core base (SPID Level 1)
test-case-oidc-core-0.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for SPID Level 1.

test-case-oidc-core-1.name: 1 - Test Case OIDC Core base (SPID Level 2)
test-case-oidc-core-1.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for SPID Level 2.

test-case-oidc-offline-access-0.name: 2 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access CU2 (SPID Level 2)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-0.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request for offline access and SPID Level 2 and Refresh Token flow for use case CU2 (30 days expiring rotation).

test-case-oidc-offline-access-1.name: 3- Test Case OIDC Offline Access CU3 (SPID Level 2)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-1.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request for offline access and SPID Level 2 and Refresh Token flow for use case CU3 (30 days renewing rotation).

test-case-oidc-offline-access-2.name: 4 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access CU2 (SPID Level 3)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-2.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request for offline access and SPID Level 3 and Refresh Token flow for use case CU2 (30 days expiring rotation).

test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-0.name: 5 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access not granted (SPID Level 1)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-0.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request without scope offline access and try refresh token request. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_grant'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-1.name: 6 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access not granted (SPID Level 2)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-1.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request without scope offline access and try refresh token request. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_grant'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-2.name: 7 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access not granted (SPID Level 3)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-2.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request without scope offline access and try refresh token request. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_grant'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-3.name: 8 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access not granted (SPID Level 1, SPID Level 2)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-3.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request with incorrect level order and try refresh token request with invalid grant. Expected authentication request response: invalid_request, expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-4.name: 9 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access not granted (SPID Level 1, SPID Level 3)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-4.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request with incorrect level order and try refresh token request. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-invalid-re.name: 10 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access invalid_request (parameter client_id is not present)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-invalid-re.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because of client_id not present. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-invalid-re.name: 11 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access invalid_request (parameter client_id invalid)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-invalid-re.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because of invalid client_id. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_request'

test-case-attribute-authority-0.name: AA1 - The request is correct and at least one value of location of the required attribute authority in authorization_details is not empty and is present in the SPID OIDC Registry at the entity listing endpoint.
test-case-attribute-authority-0.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is valid. After user authentication, IdP show AA selection and asks the user for consent to grant the SP to query the selected AA.

test-case-attribute-authority-1.name: AA2 - The request is correct and at least one value of location of the required attribute authority in authorization_details is not empty and is present in the SPID OIDC Registry at the entity listing endpoint. User does not select any AA.
test-case-attribute-authority-1.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is valid. User does not select any AA. The ask to user for consent to grant the SP to query the selected AA is not required.

test-case-attribute-authority-2.name: AA3 - The request is correct and at least one value of location of the required attribute authority in authorization_details is not empty and is present in the SPID OIDC Registry at the entity listing endpoint. User select at least one AA.
test-case-attribute-authority-2.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is valid. User select at least one AA. The ask to user for consent to grant the SP to query the selected AA is required to continue.

test-case-attribute-authority-3.name: AA4 - The request is correct and at least one value of location of the required attribute authority in authorization_details is not empty and is present in the SPID OIDC Registry at the entity listing endpoint. User select all AA.
test-case-attribute-authority-3.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is valid. User select all AA. The ask to user for consent to grant the SP to query the selected AA is required to continue.

test-case-attribute-authority-4.name: AA5 - The request is correct and at least one value of location of the required attribute authority in authorization_details is not empty and is present in the SPID OIDC Registry at the entity listing endpoint. User deselect all AA.
test-case-attribute-authority-4.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is valid. User deselect all AA. The ask to user for consent to grant the SP to query the selected AA is not required.

test-case-attribute-authority-5.name: AA6 - The request is correct but authorization_details is malformed.
test-case-attribute-authority-5.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is not valid.

test-case-attribute-authority-6.name: AA7 - The request is correct but authorization_details contains only one location that is not trusted.
test-case-attribute-authority-6.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, attribute authority location is not trusted.
